title: 01. ANALYSIS
subTitle: Keyword Research
desc: Searching for relevant queries with the highest traffic volume and lowest competition. We find entry points where others don't see them.

title: 02. VISION
subTitle: Visual ASO Optimization
desc: Creating icons and screenshots that boost CTR by 25% or more. Visual communication that compels the user to tap 'Get'.

title: 03. BUILD
subTitle: Deep Localization
desc: Adapting metadata for the cultural nuances of specific GEOs: Brazil, India, Europe. We speak to the market in its own language.
